idea:
Asterisk Biz is a service provider for complete designs & display solutions for exhibitions,events,promotions and employee engagement program. We take care of the same PAN india.

Asterisk  Biz is a end to end service provider from design/creative to execution for exhibitions/events/employee engagement program and we also take care of man power.

Our vision is to full fill client expectations and be the best service provider.
name: Asterisk Biz Events & Exhibitions

idea:
Problem: Finding professional coaching (certified coaches) in the same locality

Solution: CoachKhoj  is an online platform that bridges the gap between coaches and athlete using location-based search technology

Vision: Creating a pool of certified coaches which will in turn help produce medal-winning athletes 

Big Concept: Creating a structured coaching eco-system into sports.
name: CoachKhoj

idea:
www.pertsol.com

Pert Telecom Solutions Pvt Ltd (PertSol) is a solution and service provider with enduring proficiency in providing best of the breed Solutions, Customized Software Applications, Professional and Project Management Services. We proud to say that Quality is our essence.

PertSol demonstrates its ability in consistently meeting customer requirements with positive enthusiasm, zeal and endeavour. PertSol’s aim is to helps customers to do business in better way by leveraging its industry-wide experience, deep technology expertise and comprehensive portfolio of IT solution and services.

PertSol provides innovative processes and cutting-edge technologies to build effective and scalable solutions that help customers to achieve their business objectives. PertSol brings together people, processes and technologies to provide best-fit business and technical solutions for customers and partners. We believe that providing quality services to the clients is most essential requirement for any organization. At PertSol, we believe in providing quality services to our clients and while providing it, we constantly strive to meet deadlines.

The Company has its Corporate Head Office at Mumbai - India, a state-of-the-art Research and Development Center at Chandigarh & Mumbai - India and Sales/Marketing offices at Mumbai, Gurgaon.

PertSol's strength lies in designing and executing innovative and next generation solutions that include systems for:

• Law Enforcement Agencies, Homeland Security, Emergency Response Team

o Location Tracking Platform – Track location of victim, suspects, targets with capability of 100% location tracking with best in class accuracy

o Lawful Interception and Monitoring System – Centralized solutions for interception, monitoring and analysis across multiple telecom service providers and multiple services

o National Emergency Response System & Emergency Number Services – Mass alert systems for alerting people depending on their locations and perceived events. Location tracking for Emergency number services. Tracking of rescue team and live updates

o Data Interception and Probing – Highly scalable mass IP interception solution with built-in MITM (Man-in-the-middle) features

• Telecom Service Providers

o Complete LBS Platform– SMLC, GMLC with complete LBS and LBA. 100% subscriber tracking platform with infinite possibilities and high accuracy

o Data Warehousing and Analytics Platform

o Solutions in area of Lawful Interception, Regulatory Compliances, Roaming alerts

o Probes – Probes for QoS, network monitoring, traffic monitoring, KPI reporting, EDR generation

• Product customizations, customized software solution – If you can think it we can deliver it!

PertSol is winning combination of fundamental industry domain knowledge and established experience. We believe in achieving success for our clients through our extensive and proven domain expertise and leading technological skills that enable Smart and Informed Decisions maximizing results.
name: Pert Telecom Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
